titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an exemption from tax for individuals with gross income of not more than $50,000.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an exemption from tax for individuals with gross income of not more than $50,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from income tax individuals who have attained the age of 65 and whose gross income is not more than $50,000.
